info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 14 at 2:29PM PDT until August 14 at 3:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM PDT FOR EAST CENTRAL SAN BERNARDINO COUNTY... At 228 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Essex, or 22 miles east of Mitchell Caverns, moving south at 20 mph. Strong north winds on Interstate 40 remain likely. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. Locations impacted include... Mitchell Caverns, Highway 95 And I-40 and Essex. This includes Interstate 40 in California between mile markers 81 and 133. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
